TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StrongNameIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class StrongNameIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class StrongNameIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: Defines the identity permission for strong names.

span.span: Defines the identity permission for strong names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在版本 2.0 和更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 使用以确认调用代码在特定强名称的代码程序集。Use to confirm that the calling code is in a particular strong-named code assembly. 完整的需求才堆栈中的所有程序集具有正确的证据，以满足此要求。Full demands for succeed only if all the assemblies in the stack have the correct evidence to satisfy the demand. 链接要求使用属性，仅当成功的直接调用方具有正确的证据。Link demands that use the attribute succeed only if the immediate caller has the correct evidence. 强名称标识基于名为二进制大型对象 (BLOB)，这还可以结合使用的名称和版本特定的程序集的一个加密公钥。A strong name identity is based on a cryptographic public key called a binary large object (BLOB), which is optionally combined with the name and version of a specific assembly. 键定义唯一的命名空间，并提供强名称是真实的因为该名称定义必须由相应的私钥签名的程序集中的验证。The key defines a unique namespace and provides strong verification that the name is genuine, because the definition of the name must be in an assembly that is signed by the corresponding private key. 请注意，强名称密钥的有效性不依赖于信任关系或一定为该密钥颁发任何证书。Note that the validity of the strong name key is not dependent on a trust relationship or on any certificate necessarily being issued for the key. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，即使调用程序集具有完全信任，如果该程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, even if the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本、 标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这样可确保为所有权限的一致性并消除了标识权限的处理方式。This ensures consistency for all permissions and eliminates the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 有关强名称的完整说明，请参阅参考页。For a complete description of strong names, see the reference page. 有关强名称的程序集的详细信息，请参阅[强名称程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information about strong-named assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). 类用于定义访问的一种类型的公共成员的强名称要求。The class is used to define strong-name requirements for accessing the public members of a type. 属性可用于定义强名称程序集级别的要求。The attribute can be used to define strong-name requirements at the assembly level. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本中，您还可以使用属性来指定该程序集中的所有非公共类型都是对另一个程序集可见。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, you can also use the attribute to specify that all nonpublic types in that assembly are visible to another assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[友元程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055)。For more information, see [Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者创建一个完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`权限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在版本 2.0 和更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本、 标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 使用此构造函数的权限状态的值为创建匹配没有强名称的标识权限。Use this constructor with a permission state value of to create an identity permission that matches no strong names. 如果随后将设置和可以由权限表示属性、 特定的强名称标识。If you subsequently set the and properties, a specific strong name identity can be represented by the permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`并`version`参数可以是`null`仅当的公钥用于标识程序集。The `name` and `version` parameters can be `null` only when the public key is used to identify the assembly. 空字符串 ("") 不能代替`null`。An empty string ("") should not be used in place of `null`. 如果`name`为空字符串，引发。If `name` is an empty string, an is thrown. 名称和版本号的程序集的详细信息，请参阅[强名称程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information on names and version numbers of assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此示例中的最佳用途是生成和执行整个示例中，并查看其输出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#5)]

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or if the intersection is empty.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 两个完全相同的强名称标识权限的交集是相同的权限。The intersection of two identical strong name identity permissions is the same permission. （不是通配符） 的两个不同的交集表达式是空的权限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 通配符表达式和匹配的强名称的交集是强名称。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching strong name is the strong name. 两个匹配的通配符表达式的交集是更长的时间，更具体的两个表达式。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用结果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此示例中的最佳用途是生成和执行整个示例中，并查看其输出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，相等的其他属性，具有的标识包含通配符表达式 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 属性标识为具有的标识的子集属性 MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile.For example, the other properties being equal, an identity with the property containing the wildcard expression MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* is identified as a subset of an identity with the property MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用结果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此示例中的最佳用途是生成和执行整个示例中，并查看其输出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性可以是一个确切的名称或最后一个位置中的通配符字符可以修改; 例如，MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 和 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 是有效的名称。The value of the property can be an exact name or can be modified by a wildcard character in the final position; for example, both MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile and MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* are valid names. 如果您尝试设置属性为空字符串 ("")、引发。If you attempt to set the property to an empty string (""), an is thrown.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 权限的并集和`null`是不是权限`null`。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 权限的并集和该权限的子集是包含在其他权限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the other. 任何其他组合会导致所引发异常。Any other combination results in an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用结果方法，不是如何使用方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此示例中的最佳用途是生成和执行整个示例中，并查看其输出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 代码示例旨在演示的方法，不以演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构使用; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#3)]

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

exception.span: -or- The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.

span.span: -or- The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.

The version of the identity.

exception.span: The property value cannot be retrieved because it contains an ambiguous identity.
